meanings.definition: The part of the body connecting the head to the shoulders.
meanings.sent1: She wore a necklace that rested gently on her necks.
meanings.sent2: He felt the weight of the world on his necks as he carried the heavy backpack.
meanings.sent3: The giraffe's long necks made it easy for him to reach the leaves on the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd, her bright red scarf stood out like a sore thumb around all the other necks.
meanings.sent5: The necklace she wore sparkled in the sunlight, drawing attention to her delicate necks.

meanings.definition: The narrow part of a bottle or container where it meets the body.
meanings.sent1: The bartender carefully wiped the necks of the wine bottles before presenting them to the customers.
meanings.sent2: The perfume bottle had an elegant design on its necks, making it stand out on the dresser.
meanings.sent3: The narrow necks of the vases made them look delicate and fragile.
meanings.sent4: The message in the bottle was tightly rolled and placed inside the narrow necks, ready to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The necks of the glass jars were sealed tightly to preserve the homemade jam inside.

meanings.sent2: The athletes were necks and necks as they sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The siblings always necks each other in board games, trying to outsmart one another.
meanings.sent4: The teams were necks in the final minutes of the game, both eager to score the winning goal.
